sections.title: The Art of Balancing
sections.text: Card games thrive on balance. A single overpowered card can destroy the entire meta and make the game unplayable.

items.text: Cost vs. Effect: A card's mana cost must match its effect. Cards that are too cheap dominate the meta.
Counterplay: Every strong strategy needs a counter option. Without counterplay, the game feels unfair.
Statistical Analysis: Use data: Win rates, pick rates, and deck diversity reveal balance issues.

sections.title: Examples from TCGs
sections.text: Magic: The Gathering and Hearthstone show how difficult balancing is - even with decades of experience, cards regularly need to be banned or adjusted.
